steps: Sift flour,cocoa powder,salt and baking powder and keep it aside.
Pre-heat oven to 190 deg C
Beat eggs one by one.
Add Sugar and beat well.
Add oil and beat well.
Add milk and 1/2 cup coffee and mix well.
Add in the dry ingredients in three batches blend together with long strokes
Bake for 30 minutes at 180 deg C.
In a pan add a little water, apples diced and cinnamon powder
Once apples are softened add sugar cook for another 3 minutes and let it cool
Pre-heat oven to 190 deg C
Cut pastry sheets and fill it with the apple mix. Seal the edges.
Bake for 30 minutes at 190 deg C.
Mix flour, butter and sugar to make crumble
In a pan add berries and sugar ,on medium flame caremelise the berries
Into a baking tray transfer the berries and top with the crumble
Pre-heat oven to 190 deg C
Bake for 20 minutes.Serve hot or cold with icecream.
Mix all the ingredients in a blender
Pour the mixture into popsicle moulds and freeze for 4 hours
You ca also use whipping cream for extra richness
